typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		base as string,
		date as string,
		rates as (ref as string, val as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> getXchangeJson
getXchangeJson foldDown(unroll(rates),
	mapColumn(
		base,
		date,
		ref = rates.ref,
		val = rates.val
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
